19  {
20  class GWEN_EXPORT WindowCloseButton : public Button
21  {
22  GWEN_CONTROL_INLINE(WindowCloseButton, Button)
23  {
24  m_pWindow = NULL;
25  SetSize(31, 31);
26  SetText("");
27  }
28 
29  virtual void Render(Skin::Base* skin)
30  {
31  if (!m_pWindow)
32  return;
33 
34  skin->DrawWindowCloseButton(this,
35  IsDepressed() && IsHovered(),
36  IsHovered() && ShouldDrawHover(),
37  IsDisabled());
38  }
39

41  {
42  m_pWindow = p;
43  }
44 
45  protected:
46 
47  Controls::Base* m_pWindow;
48  };

51  class GWEN_EXPORT WindowMaximizeButton : public WindowCloseButton
52  {
53  GWEN_CONTROL_INLINE(WindowMaximizeButton, WindowCloseButton)
54  {
55  m_bMaximized = false;
56  }
57
